column2: [From.GetFirstName] has been weened and now is the time to determine [From.GetHerHis] fostering and education. Traditionally the ruler of Rivendell was trusted with the task. However perhaps it is time to break with the past.
Learn well from master Elrond, my child.
Who better for my child to learn from than me?
The Numenorean and the Elves have long been intermingling and have grown close through the ages.
The Elves and the Dunedain share an ageless bond.
I want nothing to do with the Knife-ears.
